<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Remote Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if UAV is connected to some terminal.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
